Package com.codeferm.dbaccess

Basic JDBC functionality.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DbAccess
    Abstract class to simplify JDBC database access across all JDBC wrapper implementations.
    DbBeanMapper
    Abstract class adding simple bean mapping from database field names with underscore to camelCase bean properties.
    DbBeanProcessor
    DbUtils BeanProcessor to convert underscore "_" database field names to camelCase.
    DbJdbcConn
    Home grown extension of DbAccess abstract class that uses JDBC API directly.
    DbJdbcDs
    Home grown extension of DbAccess abstract class that uses JDBC API directly.
    DbJdbcTemplate
    Spring JdbcTemplate extension of DbAccess abstract class.
    DbPersist
    Persist extension of DbAccess abstract class.
    DbQueryRunnerConn
    DBUtils QueryRunner extension of DbAccess abstract class that uses a Connection instead of a DataSource.
    DbQueryRunnerDs
    DBUtils QueryRunner extensions of DbAccess abstract class.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    DbAccessException
    RuntimeException used by DbAccess implementations.

Package com.codeferm.dbaccess Description

Basic JDBC functionality.
